privates.name: Brunel Civil Engineering
privates.description: Retire this company as part of an Upgrade Track action to replace a basic city tile with a major city tile of the next level.

privates.name: Scott Civil Engineering
privates.description: Retire this company as part of an Upgrade Track action to replace a basic city tile with a major city tile of the next level.

privates.name: Charles Early Mills
privates.description: When acquired, place the Mill token on a city. A basic city with the Mill token is worth an additional £10 for each of your routes.

privates.name: Chester Village
privates.description: When acquired, gain the Chester Village token. When upgrading a tile that contains a town, you may place the Chester Village token on a vacant track segment on that tile. Chester Village counts as a town with value £10/20/30. Your trains may make an additional stop after visiting Chester Village.

privates.name: Royal Mail Contracting
privates.description: After Running Trains, pay your treasury £10 for each termini and county visited by your trains this turn. (Each counts only once, even if visited multiple times. A county is visited if a route visits a town or city within it, as denoted by the background colour of the hex.)

privates.name: Swinford Toll Bridge
privates.description: Receive a discount of £20 whenever you build a bridge.

privates.name: Horspath Tunneling
privates.description: Retire this company to receive a discount of £40 when you next build a cutting this turn.

privates.name: Sonning Excavations
privates.description: Retire this company to receive a discount of £40 when you next build a cutting this turn.

privates.name: Stafford Road Works
privates.description: Retire this company to receive a discount of £40 when you next upgrade a train this turn.

privates.name: Fox Architecture
privates.description: Retire this company to take an additional Build or Upgrade Track action this round. (This may be before or after any other build actions.)

privates.name: Beeching Accountancy
privates.description: Retire this company to remove a town from a track segment to which you can trace a route. You may not select the home town of a Minor Railway nor the Chester Village token.

notes.note: No more than 50% of a corporation's shares may be in the market at any time
